programme.desc: The competition heads to the Western Region as new competitors push their bodies to the limit by battling opponents in unforgiving head-to-head challenges, designed by host and executive producer Dwayne Johnson. In this episode, competitors will compete in a best of three competition where the winner will move on to battle a Pro-Athlete Titan on Mt. Olympus, the consummate athletic test of speed, strength, agility and endurance. The top female competitor will face professional stuntwoman and “American Ninja Warrior” star Jessie Graff, while the top man will advance to compete against Super Bowl champion Victor Cruz. Cari Champion and Alex Mendez serve as commentators.

programme.desc: Yum Jung-ah, Ahn Eun-jin, Park Jun-myun, Dex and special guests are visiting seaside villages in Korea. They will live there and cook fresh seasonal dishes using ingredients from the sea.

programme.title: The Village Barber
programme.desc: Park Bo-gum, who holds a national barber’s license, and his close friends Lee Sang-yi and Kwak Dong-yeon run a special barbershop in a remote rural village, tending to both hair and hearts.

programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: <Dear X> follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: <Dear X> follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.title: Seoul At Home
programme.desc: Michelin star chef Alvin Leung will show us how to make molecular Korean cuisine at home!

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes – from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: Walking Through The Village
programme.desc: Actor Gu Bon-seung shows the warmth and purity of life in the village along the river, and presents how new history was made and became one’s memory.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A life-changing story of a man who has lived as a loner his entire life. Jae Shik begins to live together with a child with a hearing-visual disability, as they change each other's lives and try to find a way to communicate.

programme.title: The Golden Holiday
programme.desc: Byeong-Soo works as a detective in the countryside and takes his family on a trip to the Philippines. He becomes involved in a crime planned by Patric, becoming a murder suspect.

programme.title: The Hitman'S Bodyguard
programme.desc: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

programme.title: Suicide Forest Village
programme.desc: One day a mysterious box arrived and a curse began to spread all over. The source of the box is 'Jukai Village'. The village is hidden in Jukai Forest, a suicide spot that once you enter it, you can never come out.

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: A man and his family has just recently moved into a house when a sinkhole suddenly engulfs the whole apartment. As rain begins to fill the sinkhole with water, the survivors must find a solution before time runs out.

programme.title: Go-Go Sisters
programme.desc: Go-go sisters brings together two parallel stories about young ambitious teenage girls and middle-aged women who have experienced life's sweet spiciness.

programme.title: The Informer
programme.desc: Because of a failed drug bust, An FBI informant intentionally gets himself incarcerated again in order to infiltrate the mob at a maximum security prison

programme.title: Dragons Forever
programme.desc: Three successful Hong Kong lawyers are hired by a chemical company of questionable ethics and must eventually make a difficult decision when their employer's motives become clear.

programme.title: Acts Of Vengeance
programme.desc: A formerly fast-talking lawyer takes a vow of silence and trains himself to avenge the murder of his family

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: Yong hears a stranger's voice from the future, connecting them to each other and sharing their love stories.

programme.title: Second Act
programme.desc: A lady with little educational qualification but abundance of street smarts lands a job in a corporate firm when a friend creates a fake profile for her. Now, She must live the lie convincingly

programme.title: Outer Man
programme.desc: An alien that looks like a popular TV character tries to brainwash the Japanese people into invading the Earth.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Exploring the wilderness and wildlife of the Atlantic Ocean. Winter brings bitter storms, suffering and conflict, while most are battling to survive.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: As winter draws to a close, the Atlantic springs back to life. Fish that spent the winter out in the deeper water have returned. An eagle pair has set up home high above the perfect fishing spot.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: In the Atlantic's far north, autumn is the season of gales, cooling temperatures and driving rain. This is when the wildlife must make the final preparations for winter or migrate to warmer climes.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: The kids battle Shashi in Las Vegas as Shashi tries to take down evil billionaire Cleve and use Skeleton Key to create a new world order. Frostee has a plan to get Skeleton Key offline, but it only gives Tony ten seconds to take Shashi out and save the world.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: After Jim finds the Killahead Bridge has been moved, he must use a horseshoe to find who in Arcadia is a changeling.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jim finds a Changeling when babysiting for Claire & finally has proof for Trollmarket but can't tell Claire; Meanwhile AAARRRGGHH!! moves in with Toby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy attempts to complete her Dad’s abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didn’t take the tides into consideration. Now she’s in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Village’s babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: When Pig is abducted by a cat-lady-alien, Tip and Oh must travel to a cat-planet to save him; After Tip becomes a social media star, Tip gets addicted to "the likes," risking Oh's life in the process

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: When an alien moves into the apartment above them, Oh thinks he's a threat to earth but nobody believes him; Oh befriends the Busy Bodies on Lucy's behalf

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Hiccup and Astrid go away for a weekend, the Edge is attacked by Krogan, Viggo, and their new Dragon Flyers

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Hiccup and the riders are on the run from the Flyers, but when they return to Berk, where Stoick is preparing for war, Hiccup is torn between his desire to get the Edge back and his unwillingness to fire on dragons

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Ms. Nowhere drops the kids off in Brazil and leaves to go on her own important mission, but things immediately go south for Tony and his crew. When the hauler and gear gets caught in quicksand, Tony needs to learn that a good leader knows when to accept help.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: After losing their mission materials in quicksand, Tony decides to channel Dom and Blend in to get intel from the people of Rio. Unfortunately it's more difficult than he expected, and Tony and his crew are picked up by a group of favela gangsters in a neighborhood that worships a mysterious young female martyr. The crew is relieved to find that Layla is in charge of the gangsters - until she orders the gangsters to dispose of them!

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Tony is convinced that Layla is deep undercover and tries to talk to her alone to get through to her. Meanwhile, the crew investigates the gang’s production of the mysterious formula from the tattoo. When Frostee discovers that the product of the formula is unstable and will explode, Tony has to save Layla, who is driving a whole truck of it!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: The gang breaks into Stricklers office for clues to Killahead Bridge but ends up releasing a monster into school and Strickler reveals his true form.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jims Trollhunting life and his high school life collide when Claire becomes a target for Goblin revenge.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their “creature awareness” message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways… or else!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Indonesian famous models Patricia and Chika as they explore the city's hidden gems and vibrant scenes, immersing themselves in amazing contrasts and trendy vibes.

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Fong Sai-Yuk, Return of Heroes
programme.desc: After Fong Sai-Yuk’s adoptive father is murdered by traitors of the Red Flower Society, he vows to hunt them down and avenge his death. Driven by grief and loyalty, he rises against the conspirators in a ruthless fight for justice.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Society’s conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3

This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Fist of Legend

Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Facing soaring costs, mounting criticism, and a tight deadline, Walt Disney pushes the limits of technology to create the first full-length animated feature film.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: Thanks to the industry-defining innovations of three men through the creation of games like Super Mario and Pokémon, Nintendo goes from a struggling playing card company to a video game juggernaut.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: All over the world, there are giant monoliths that our ancient ancestors carved out of solid rock. But what was the purpose of these huge stone monuments? Did they serve some kind of ritual function?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: A vast majority of these strange and disturbing incidents take place in the same locations on Earth. Is it possible that extraterrestrial spacecraft are visiting Earth at so-called 'UFO Hot Spots'?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: For thousands of years, people have believed that everyday objects can possess hidden energy. Talismans are seen as providing protection and good fortune, and some are thought to embody a higher power.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Throughout the world, there are ancient structures that defy explanation. How were ancient civilisations able to build such extraordinary structures? And what purpose did they serve?

programme.title: The Pickers (S18)

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S5)
programme.desc: Most people know it as the biblical birthplace of man. But is the Garden of Eden really just a story to explain creation? Or could it be a real place? And if it did exist—where exactly was it?

programme.title: Hanggang Ngayo'y Ika'y Minamahal
programme.desc: She loves her husband despite his irresponsible ways.She continues to stand by him despite his flaws.

programme.title: Bitag (Babae At Bala)
programme.desc: Sgt. Nick Nobleza (Jestoni Alarcon) is the straightest cop in the police force. He is assigned to infiltrate the drug syndicate of Mr. Villafuerte. But Mr. Villafuerte is one step ahead as he sets up a trap of his own.

programme.title: Robin Good, Sugod Nang Sugod
programme.desc: Jimmy Santos was the outlaw Robin Good, who stole from the rich to give to the poor. Unlike the swashbuckling hero of the Sherwood Forest legend though, Robin Good was an inept and bumbling coward who could not seem to do anything right.

programme.title: Pandoy... Alalay Ng Panday
programme.desc: In Pandoy, Joey De Leon gave a comic twist to the popular "Panday," a fictional action hero popularized by the King himself, Fernando Poe, Jr.

programme.title: Sana Bukas Pa Ang Kahapon (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Three friends made their way in the big city. In the end they all thought of the things they should never have done, wondering what might have been had these tomorrows been their yesterdays.

programme.title: Marami Ka Pang Kakaining Bigas
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.

programme.title: Dodong Armado
programme.desc: Raymart played Dodong, a young man who was trying to escape the memory of a tragic childhood which claimed the lives of his parents.

programme.title: Silang Matatapang (Walang Atras Sa Laban)
programme.desc: Raymond Bagatsing is set to plunge headstrong into this action picture. His voluptuous real life girlfriend, Shirley Fuentes, is part of the cast in this slambang action movie.

programme.title: Friends In Love (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Set in the sprawling campus of Brent School in scenic Baguio City, young stars Sharon, William, Jackie Lou and Rowell played a game of romantic musical chairs in this heartwarming story. Opposites attract and they were all faced with the difficulty of adjusting to the differences in their personalities.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Puso
programme.desc: This is a love story as torrid and as passionate as a smouldering volcano.

programme.title: Bruce Liit
programme.desc: Bruce (Niño Muhlach) is eager to learn karate specially when he sees his father practice. But Miguel (Ramon Zamora) keeps on postponing his son's instruction deeming Bruce too young to appreciate the principles behind this particular vocation.

programme.title: Nag-Iisang Ikaw
programme.desc: Cissy (Mikee Cojuangco) started to doubt if Albert (Matthew Mendoza) was the right man for her. While working for a fashion magazine, she met a photographer, Aaron (Keempee De Leon).

programme.title: The Flor Contemplacion Story (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The tragic tale of the Filipino maid hanged for the murder in Singapore in 1995 not only called the attention to the plight of overseas workers everywhere in the world but also resulted in one of the most acclaimed films in Philippine motion picture history.

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: Smallville S2 3
programme.desc: After one of his friends discovers Clark's spaceship in the cornfield, Clark defies his parents' wishes and reveals his secret to the person--who gives him a shocking reaction.

programme.title: Smallville S2 4
programme.desc: When the school unwittingly uses red meteor rocks in its class rings, Clark experiences a new meteorite effect.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: The world's most revered monster is reborn as visionary new director Gareth Edwards (Monsters) unleashes the epic action adventure GODZILLA. Starring an international ensemble cast led by Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Oscar nominee Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai, Inception), Elizabeth Olsen, Oscar winner Juliette Binoche (The English Patient) and Oscar nominee Sally Hawkins (Blue Jasmine) with Oscar nominee David Strathairn (Good Night, and Good Luck.) and Breaking Bad's Bryan Cranston, GODZILLA is a powerful story of human courage and reconciliation in the face of titanic forces of nature -- when the awe-inspiring creature rises to restore balance as humanity stands defenseless. This spectacular adventure pits the world's most famous monster against malevolent creatures that, bolstered by humanity's scientific arrogance, threaten our very existence.

programme.title: The Legend Of Tarzan (2016)
programme.desc: A new live-action adventure from director David Yates (Harry Potter films) brings Edgar Rice Burroughs' legendary character back to the big screen. It's been years since the man once known as Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgard --True Blood) left the jungles of Africa behind for a gentrified life as John Clayton III, Lord Greystoke, with his beloved wife, Jane (Margot Robbie --The Wolf of Wall Street) at his side. Now, he has been invited back to the Congo to serve as a trade emissary of Parliament, unaware that he is a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed and revenge, masterminded by the Belgian, Captain Leon Rom (Oscar® winner Christoph Waltz). But those behind the murderous plot have no idea what they are about to unleash.

programme.title: Justice League (2017)
programme.desc: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of metahumans to stand against this newly awakened threat. But despite the formation of this unprecedented league of heroes – Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash – it may already be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: Overworked Sandra Bullock has had enough of being millionaire Hugh Grant's lawyer, and she's about to quit!

programme.title: Friends S7 4
programme.desc: Rachel wants to hire a cute, young male assistant over a more qualified woman. Joey's show gets cancelled. Chandler, Monica and Ross tell embarrassing secrets about one another.

programme.title: Friends S7 5
programme.desc: Joey tries to teach Chandler how to smile for an engagement picture with Monica. Phoebe and Ross each date the members of a couple preparing for divorce. Joey takes Tag out for a good time.

programme.title: Friends S7 6
programme.desc: Rachel and Phoebe compete to be Monica's maid of honor--but Monica doesn't want to make the decision. Phoebe eventually allows Rachel to fulfill the duty. Chandler tries to apologize to a girlfriend from his youth.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 9
programme.desc: When the University reassigns Sheldon’s (unused) parking spot to Howard, the ensuing turf battle affects the whole gang.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 10
programme.desc: Sheldon plays nursemaid to a sick Amy, while Howard attempts to bond with his father-in-law (guest star CASEY SANDER) on an upcoming fishing trip.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 11
programme.desc: Sheldon unwillingly revisits some Christmas memories during a lively game of Dungeons and Dragons, while Raj joins the girls for ladies night out.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 12
programme.desc: Sheldon is accused of sexual harassment at the University and winds up dragging Leonard, Raj and Howard into the fray.

programme.title: Smallville S1 1
programme.desc: Teenager Clark Kent must cope with his emerging superpowers and his love for classmate Lana Lang. Clark befriends Lex Luthor and thwarts a vengeful former student.

programme.title: Smallville S1 2
programme.desc: Clark learns a fellow student has been attacked by Kryptonite-affected bugs and has taken on the life cycle of an insect -- with Lana as his prey.

programme.title: Smallville S1 3
programme.desc: Clark and Lex defy their respective fathers.

programme.title: Smallville S1 4
programme.desc: Clark reels from his first flashes of X-ray vision. His shock is compounded when he witnesses a bank robbery, apparently by his friend, Lex.

programme.title: Smallville S1 5
programme.desc: Clark has a chance to share a night out on the town with Lana, thanks to Lex's matchmaking, but the evening is interrupted when Clark faces an icy enemy, Sean Kelvin (MICHAEL CORISTINE).

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 23
programme.desc: Sal, Murr, Joe and Q give all-you-can eat buffet customers all they can handle and turn into real power tools while teaching workshops at a hardware store. Then, the big loser suffers a punishment that will make your skin crawl.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 24
programme.desc: The guys serve up raw deals while working the counter at a pawn shop and try to convince strangers in the park to give them hugs after incredibly bizarre apologies. Then, the big loser performs his own life story through song.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 12
programme.desc: The buyers come face-to-face with one of the strangest lockers ever seen. It's an odd opportunity that sends the bidding through the roof, but when the door is unlocked, Pandora's box reveals a surprise that sends its winning bidder through the roof.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 13
programme.desc: Cash is falling from the sky as our buyers go head to head at the biggest airport auction ever seen. Jesse gambles hard on a mystery box with a telling message. Then, Scott and Chrissy battle it out over a jet-fueled jewel. And later, the crowd is driven to a frenzy when Sean reveals a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity that's gonna make one deep-pocketed bidder's dreams come true.

programme.title: Smallville S1 6
programme.desc: Clark is wracked with haunting visions when he meets an old woman, Cassandra Carpenter (JACKIE BURROUGHS), who can see the future.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 6
programme.desc: At a sporting goods store, a confused customer debates the laws of physics with Michael after he suddenly makes a lightweight box impossibly heavy. Then as a barista, Michael shows caf� patrons that glass is not nearly as impenetrable as it seems. Plus, he spooks museum workers when he shows that boomerangs really do always come back, and that taxidermy is a less than permanent solution.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 7
programme.desc: In a Mexican restaurant, Michael treats incredulous diners to a good luck serpent with their tableside guacamole, and makes salsa so spicy it melts metal. Then, he confuses office coworkers with a never-ending brown bag lunch and a frozen meal thatturns out to be alarmingly fresh. Plus, he confounds his new assistant with some tricks of the trade as a real estate agent, including freshening dead flowers right before her eyes.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Anak Perjanjian Syaitan 2
programme.desc: Haunted since childhood, orphan Azlinda believes her torment stems from her parents' dark history. Her friends Zurina, Wati, and Ustaz join forces to end her suffering, but a malevolent demon interrupts their efforts. Will Azlinda succeed in severing the cursed ties that bind her, or is she destined to remain trapped in darkness forever?

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted

Will Azlinda succeed in severing the cursed ties that bind her, or is she destined to remain trapped in darkness forever?

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Artiste Yin Qing enters Hell's Gate through a supernatural TV show and reunites with her late friend Mei Qi. At Mei Qi's gravesite, Yin Qing encounters Mei Qi's husband, Dong Sheng, and a series of mysterious incidents unfold. She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: A brutal attack on two employees of a high-end shop leaves one woman dead and another scarred by the memory of the events she survived.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A fight at a marijuana dispensary ends with a stabbing, and a couple faces life-changing charges. A 22-year-old rapper is delighted by his mugshot but not by spending his birthday in jail.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Charming and smart, Henry tried to hide his dark side, fuelled by years of abuse and twisted fantasies, until his first murder. Then, bad Henry took over.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: Spring Valley's Haitian community is rocked when a civic leader is murdered. It takes police nearly two decades to sift through the rumours and solve a mystery filled with lies and dark secrets.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: Exotic animal dealer William 'Wild Bill' Zelenski is accused of murdering his girlfriend's 18-year-old son, Ryelee Manente-Powell, after he stole $27,000 worth of venomous and exotic reptiles.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, detectives scour the city for a man on the run while trying to uncover the truth behind a woman's mysterious injuries.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A defendant announces college baseball scores during his murder trial; a man facing drug charges gets caught smoking marijuana in the virtual courtroom; a domestic violence suspect threatens a judge.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A road rage suspect attacks a bailiff in court; a grieving mother screams at the hit-and-run driver who killed her daughter; a jury bungles the sentencing phase of a murder trial; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: Evidence leads detectives in Mobile to believe that a victim was murdered by two gunmen. But the trial leaves the jury wrestling with the question of whether one of the suspects could be found not guilty.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: JaRay Wilson texted her mother just minutes before she vanished. For over a year, the teen's friends, family, and community searched for answers.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Stories of mothers and fathers who made headlines by committing crimes out of malice, extremism, and desperation.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Feisty Chiquita Tate grew up determined to make something of herself after being raised in poverty by a drug-addicted mom. Now a hard-working lawyer, the only thing missing in her life is a man.

programme.title: Homicide Squad New Orleans (S1)
programme.desc: Early on Sunday morning, Detective Tanisha Sykes Smith responds to a man found deceased from multiple gunshot wounds alongside a building in the Lower 9th Ward.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: A 52-year-old VP of a medical center faces 95 years in prison for fatally stabbing a doctor's husband. He insists he was trapped by a man intent on harming him and forced to defend himself.

programme.title: Lie Detector: Truth Or Deception
programme.desc: Chris Turner sits for a high-stakes polygraph test in the hopes of ending suspicions surrounding the infamous 1984 murder of Catherine Fuller.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a Georgia college student disappears, police open an investigation into a possible hate crime and abduction. However, Dr. Jamie Downs uncovers evidence that spins the case in a new direction.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S3)
programme.desc: After a woman's body is found in a neighbourhood dumpster, investigators narrow down their suspect list to three people, but will they be able to convince the men to break their brotherly bond?

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Troubled teen Alyssa Bustamante was a self-styled 'bad girl' who said she wanted to know how it felt to kill. She gave in to this curiosity and murdered her nine-year-old neighbour Elizabeth Olten.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: The family of Miya Marcano share the agonising details of what happened around the beautiful 19-year-old's disappearance.

programme.title: Les Triples
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: L'Aventure Du Monde Des Mondes
programme.desc: Dimitri, Raph's and Anaïs's uncle, is a French globetrotter who is fascinated by nature. He gives them tasks to stimulate their creativity. Thanks to Blox, a small robot, they access the ''world of the worlds'', a secret fantasy place where they can play and learn.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Territoires De France
programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: echappees Belles
programme.desc: Sophie Jovillard, Jerôme Pitorin, Ismaël Khelifa and Tiga embark the traveller that lies within each of us for a fabulous breath of fresh air! Ninety minutes filled with new horizons and fascinating encounters around the world, four different ways of seeing a city, a region, a country...

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Born in Harlem, of Dominican parents, JonOne grew up in a difficult context before moving to France, in 1987. Initially a street artist, he became a major contemporary artist, mixing a blend of New-Yorker and French influences, and different origins. The self-taught artist welcomes Magloire in his workshop in Roubaix.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Ils Vecurent Heureux
programme.desc: Despite all of Charles's efforts, Emma Bovary is bored to death in her tiny, remote village. Luckily, she doesn't lack company.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: The body of Helene Bertillon, director of a water sports base, is found in the Saint-Paul pond nature reserve. As the investigation is conducted jointly by the police and the gendarmerie, tensions rise quickly.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Another body is discovered and all eyes turn to the victim's phone, which may contain valuable clues.

programme.title: Version Francaise
programme.desc: The Cite du vitrail in Troyes traces almost ten centuries of history. In Paris, textile artist Aude Franjou's linen sculpture has taken up position inside the July Column on Place de la Bastille. In a theatrical spirit, Palomo Spain blurs genres. Meet artist and cabinetmaker Maxim, creator of the Oodelally workshop.

programme.title: #Investigation
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Geopolitis
programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Geopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: Sarah Bernhardt, A Corps Perdu
programme.desc: World-wide celebrity, Sarah Bernhardt (1844-1923) was the first actress to travel the five continents. Modern, transgressive and forever remembered as a ''monstre sacre'', a term Jean Cocteau invented to describe her. Her life, her struggles, her triumphs: we look back at the life and career of a free woman.

programme.title: Arletty - Soehring : Helas, Je T'Aime
programme.desc: Made famous by her role in ''Hôtel du Nord'', Arletty (1898-1992) became the star of ''Visiteurs du Soir'' and ''Enfants du Paradis''. But, at the same time, her love affair with a German officer, Hans-Jürgen Soehring, caused a scandal. We explore their correspondence.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Dans Les Bottes De Lucky Luke
programme.desc: For a lone cowboy, nothing expresses the spirit of the West more intensely than the road itself. Route 66, Highway 143, Interstate 90. Simply take one of these asphalt ribbons and be transported deep into American history, where gleaming lorries replace Wells Fargo stagecoaches.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Refuges De Montagne - Hiver
programme.desc: At the Suppenalp mountain hut, when Simon hoists the flags at the start of the season, he is spoilt for choice. In Hollandia, a group of heli-skiers announce at the last moment: they want cakes. Nicola opens Es-Cha with her partner, Silvana. She's back to lend her a hand.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: A geopolitical and cartographic programme.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Version Francaise
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 23
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Osyana ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 8
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 13
